oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Replication Data for: "Insights from micromechanical modeling of intact rock failure: Event characteristics, stress drops and force networks" by Mirko van der Baan and Drew Chorney, submitted to Journal of Geophysical Research: Solid Earth.
